import React from 'react' import { withTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import './index.less' import WrapperEmail from './WrapperEmail' class EmailSetting extends React.PureComponent { render() { const { i18n } = this.props return (

{i18n.t('setting.titleEmailSetting')}

{i18n.t('setting.why')}

  • {i18n.t('setting.answerWhy1')}
  • {i18n.t('setting.answerWhy2')}

{i18n.t('setting.howToUse')}

  • {i18n.t('setting.answerHow1')}
  • {i18n.t('setting.answerHow2')}
  • {i18n.t('setting.answerHow3')}
) } } export default withTranslation()(EmailSetting)
